name: ClassleSoft YouTube Downloader
short_description:
Downloading YouTube videos has never been easier. ClassleSoft YouTube Downloader allows you to fetch and download YouTube videos with ease. Here are some of features of our freeware.
•	Downloaded videos support across various devices like PC, Laptop, iPhone, iPad, Cell Phone, DVD, and PSP. 
•	Download multiple videos simultaneously using your favourite web browser.
•	Built in video download acceleration for faster download.
•	Supports latest changes in YouTube, so no worries about downloaded videos playability.
•	Download YouTube videos in various popular video formats like Mp4, WEBM, FLV and 3GP file formats. 
•	It supports downloading High Definition (HD) and High Quality (HQ) videos.
•	Supports Unicode characters (like Telugu, Malayalam, Hindi, Chinese, Thai, Japanese etc.) 
•	User-friendly and simple graphical user interface.
summary: It allows you to fetch and download YouTube videos with ease.
